root: ^*Hold up t-shirt* Do you know anything about this?

hold: ^That seems to be my t-shirt. Why detective?
^This shirt was found at the scene of the crime
crime: ^I swear I didn't do it. Someone must have a similar shirt to mine. I am innocent.
^Okay, do you know anything else about what happened that night?
night: ^I don't know anything. I have told you all that I know.
